title: Kanye West says it feels like he's been married to Kim Kardashian for '500 years'
text:
Kanye West claimed it feels like he's been married to Kim Kardashian for '500 years' during a special 'Airpool Karaoke' segment on The Late Late Show with James Corden.

The 42 year old rapper, who just dropped his ninth studio album Jesus Is King last week, has been married to his 39 year old wife for five years, but he claimed marriage years are longer than human years.

West would go on to compare 'marriage years' to 'dog years,' with one dog year equivalent to seven human years, though every 'marriage year' is equal to 100 human years.

Married: Kanye West claimed it feels like he's been married to Kim Kardashian for '500 years' during a special 'Airpool Karaoke' segment on The Late Late Show with James Corden

Plane: The 42 year old rapper, who just dropped his ninth studio album Jesus Is King last week, has been married to his 39 year old wife for five years, but he claimed marriage years are longer than human years.

'Marriage years are different than human years,' West began. 'Like you know how dog years are like seven years? Every marriage year is like 100 years,' West joked (via ET).

West, who married Kardashian in May 2014, added that it feels like he's been married to the Keeping Up With the Kardashians star for '500 years.'

His wife has yet to respond to her husband's statement, but it was made on Corden's long-running Carpool Karaoke that was changed to Airpool Karaoke to have it on a jet.

Jet: His wife has yet to respond to her husband's statement, but it was made on Corden's long-running Carpool Karaoke that was changed to Airpool Karaoke to have it on a jet

Marriage: 'Marriage years are different than human years,' West began. 'Like you know how dog years are like seven years? Every marriage year is like 100 years,' West joked (via ET ).

In the Carpool Karaoke sketch, Corden calls a random celebrity to drive to work with him, but this time, Corden's flight to Los Angeles is canceled so he asks West for a ride on his plane, carrying his entire Sunday Service choir.

Corden had been trying to get West on Carpool Karaoke only to have West cancel on him twice, but the third time was the charm, it seems.

Aside from the Carpool Karaoke session taking place on a plane instead of a car, West's appearance marked another first, with the choir performing the first live performance in the sketch's history.

Choir: In the Carpool Karaoke sketch, Corden calls a random celebrity to drive to work with him, but this time, Corden's flight to Los Angeles is canceled so he asks West for a ride on his plane, carrying his entire Sunday Service choir

Sketch: Corden had been trying to get West on Carpool Karaoke only to have West cancel on him twice, but the third time was the charm, it seems

West also talked how his friends and family, while meaning well, didn't know how to get through to him.

'People in my family were praying for me, but they couldn't call me and scream at me. I'm a grown man,' West said.

'But it was God that came and put this thing on my heart and asked if I was ready to be in service to him,' West said, adding, 'I have no regret and no shame.'

Friends and family: West also talked how his friends and family, while meaning well, didn't know how to get through to him

West also performed his hit song Jesus Walks from his 2004 album College Dropout, but he made some subtle changes to the lyrics.

He also performed Selah from his new album Jesus Is King, before the plane landed and the segment ended.

Jesus Is King was released on October 25, after weeks of delays.
description: Kanye West claimed it feels like he's been married to Kim Kardashian for '500 years' during a special 'Airpool Karaoke' segment on The Late Late Show with James Corden.
